name: soho tote
notes:
the tote bag is a quick, easy and modern crochet bag! this pattern is crocheted in one entire piece (even the straps are crocheted directly onto the body) so there is no need for seaming and you only fasten off once, right at the end! this pattern creates a strong and versatile crochet tote thatâ€™s perfect for summer, groceries, famers markets or beach days!

size: one size
skill level: easy

this pattern is accompanied by a video tutorial.
